ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.1_0: At one time the Buddha was staying at Rājagaha in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrel sanctuary.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.2_0: On one occasion in Rājagaha there was a hilltop fair,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.3_0: and the nuns from the group of six went to see it.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.4_0: People complained and criticized the monks,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.5_0: “How can nuns go to see dancing, singing, and music? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.6_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.7_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.8_0: “How can the nuns from the group of six go to see dancing, singing, and music?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.9_0: “Is it true, monks, that those nuns did that?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.12_0: “How can the nuns from the group of six go to see dancing, singing, and music?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.13_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.14_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.15.1_0: ‘If a nun goes to see dancing or singing or music, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.11_0: If she is on her way to see it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.12_0: Wherever she stands to see it or hear it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.13_0: Every time she moves beyond the range of sight and then sees it or hears it again, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.14_0: If he is on his way to see one division of a fourfold army, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.15_0: Wherever she stands to see it or hear it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.16_0: Every time she moves beyond the range of sight and then sees it or hears it again, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.2_0: if she sees it or hears it while remaining in a monastery;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.3_0: if the army comes to where the nun is standing, sitting, or lying down, but they bathe;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.4_0: if she sees it or hears it while walking in the opposite direction;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.5_0: if she goes there because there is something to be done and she then sees it or hears it;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.8_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.9_0: The tenth training rule is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.10_0: The first sub-chapter on garlic is finished.
